thread.title: The internet can't stop laughing at adidas' Derrick Rose shoe tagline
thread.title_full: The internet can't stop laughing at adidas' Derrick Rose shoe tagline | Chicago Sun-Times

author: | emailAddress.indexOf('@') == -1) {errorString = 'Please enter your email address';} var isError = false; if (errorString.length > 0) isError = true; if (isError) alert(errorString); return !isError;}
title: The internet can't stop laughing at adidas' Derrick Rose shoe tagline
text:
Watch out internet, keep laughing that hard and you might injure a lung.
People are still trying to catch their breath after hearing the news that the slogan adidas is using for its Derrick Rose campaign this year is “Never Break.”
Slogan Adidas is using on its Derrick Rose campaign this year pic.twitter.com/MoLLNy5Lzy
— Darren Rovell (@darrenrovell) October 21, 2015
Derrick Rose's newest adidas ad provides confusing tagline Rose, of course, is notorious for frequently being injured.
According to Fox Sports , the 27-year-old has missed 237 games during his career due to 18 different injuries.
So it’s easy to understand why people found the slogan amusing. Seriously though, you better stop before you pee yourself.
@darrenrovell @ESPNChicago I just want to say/ express #Never Break #Rose +=
— 2015 is our yrGoCubs (@Avila2080) October 21, 2015
So Derrick Rose Adidas slogan is “never break” #comedy
— D. Waller (@twelvenofed) October 22, 2015
Derrick Rose slogan is 'Never Break'… There's no joke here. That is the joke.
— Jared (@AroundCloudNine) October 22, 2015
Never Break? D. Rose? Ha! https://t.co/95ZiaKQDeU
— Alen (@AlenPangeaKidz) October 8, 2015
@footlocker @adidasHoops never break? its a derrick rose shoe. that makes no sense. always broken
— Joseph Jensen (@jj_the_jetson) October 8, 2015
D.Rose New Shoe Slogan Is “Never Break”
— (2-2) Grown Simba (@KidNamedJack) October 9, 2015
Derrick Rose’s new slogan is “Never Break” LLLLMMMFFFAAOO TEARS ARE FLOWING LIKE A RIVER
— Dream Big. (@JuiceWilliams17) October 21, 2015
Derrick Rose's slogan is "never break"… What's next, Tom Brady "don't deflate"? https://t.co/y23lYGO160
— Sebastian Hurtado (@sebyhurtado) October 21, 2015
The Irony. Haha!!" @BR_NBA : Adidas’ new slogan for Derrick Rose: “Never Break” https://t.co/uzyMqx4O7t pic.twitter.com/YL6ztTYTIY "
— Hassan (@kh1892) October 21, 2015
Someone should remind Adidas that Rose has missed more games in the last 5 years than Duncan has his whole career…"never break"
— Brian (@BrianLFontenot) October 21, 2015
RT @SBNation adidas’ ‘Never Break’ is an AWKWARD slogan for Derrick Rose’s new shoe. https://t.co/OLTVk0f59I pic.twitter.com/51R5iaDQd5
— Irish Jam (@Mongo_23) October 21, 2015
D.Rose new Adidas slogan is "Never Break" LMAOOOO goodnight
— O (@SooMajor) October 21, 2015
Derrick Rose's slogan for his new shoe is "Never Break" because apparently Adidas doesn't understand the concept of irony.
— Chris (@CausticChris) October 21, 2015
Hahahaha this is a joke right?
"Adidas Unveils 'Never Break' Tagline for Rose Merchandise " via @TeamStream https://t.co/74rSVHa4po
— Adam Flieger (@adamflieger) October 22, 2015
Derrick Rose clothing line called “Never Break”
— Chocolate Drop™ (@Jrussell1205) October 21, 2015
Lma RT @BleacherReport : Adidas’ new slogan for Derrick Rose is "Never Break” https://t.co/COd219EB1L
— r i ć h (@son_ofa_GUNN) October 21, 2015
